Package de.jhh4.tiles

package de.jhh4.tiles
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Forest
    forests can be traversed and provide one wood
    Mountain
    Mountain tiles can currently be traversed to allow for worker placement of outposts/mines provides gold/stone when worked
    Ocean
    Oceans are at the border of the map and limit the game are, providing one food
    Plains
    plains can be traversed and provide one food
    Tile
    takes care of logic for tiles/the game object description: a forest is green, produces wood, and is accessible abstraction: a tile object has a terrain type a colour, a ressource, an accessible boolean a return method for ressource
